project.name: Bling ERP Integration Manager
project.description: **Bling Connect** - Sistema de Gerenciamento de Integração com Bling ERP

features.name: 9.4 Phase 4: Advanced Features (2-3 weeks)
features.description: Implementation of 9.4 phase 4: advanced features (2-3 weeks)

features.name: A. API Endpoints Reference
features.description: Implementation of a. api endpoints reference

install: pnpm add docker react class-variance-authority react-dom @radix-ui/react-slot tailwind-css @react-router/serve jwt clsx @react-router/node remix-flat-routes tailwind-merge zod postgres drizzle-orm
pnpm add -D @types/react-dom typescript drizzle-kit @types/react vite tailwindcss-animate @react-router/dev tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer @types/pg

config_files.tsconfig.json:
{
  "include": ["**/*.ts", "**/*.tsx"],
  "compilerOptions": {
    "lib": ["DOM", "DOM.Iterable", "ES6"],
    "allowJs": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "strict": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "moduleResolution": "bundler",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "noEmit": true,
    "jsx": "react-jsx"
  }
}
